On or before December 1, 1999, and then on December 1 for each of the succeeding 10 years, the Commissioner shall report to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly the following information:
the progress of the International Commission in receiving, investigating, and resolving insurance claims of Holocaust victims; and
the status of any reports that insurers were directed to file under § 28-105 of this title.
